---
title: "Conda"
---

This page contains useful commands/tips for conda usage

## Frequently used commands

```bash
conda remove -n ENV_NAME --all # Deletes the ENV_NAME along with all its packages (This one requiers you to confirm yes)
conda remove -n ENV_NAME --all -y # This one do not ask for confirmation

```

```bash
conda env list # List all environments
```
